name: Don't Forget (chillingPikachu)
description: the game plays in the  time, when corona hit our fences. Maybe you know this, but in the monkey city Lopburi, Thailand hell was going on. thousands of monkeys raided the city to get some food, because due to corona, tourists stopped travelling and therefore stopped visiting the monkeys. The monkeys therefore did not get enough food and they lost the ability to find foodfor themself.
